page.title: 08SURVEY CONT.
page.content: { {Housing} 1 Over 48% had lived in Gainford for over 10 years. 2 36% lived in a detached house, 24% in semi-detached and 24% terraced. 3 72% owned their own home, 24% rented their home and 4% lived in a house that went with the job. 4 68% of houses had solid fuel heat, 24% oil and 8% none at all.(No gas in the village). {Recreation 1 People spent their leisure time as follows:- 19% gardening, 16% read, 16% television, 12% DIY, 13% active sports, 3% spectator sports,8% club or society, 7% musical instruments and 6% wine and beer making. 2 48% of people had 2 cars, 4% more than two, 40% had 1 car and 8% had no car.
